item.title: Rooja add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "You can't see yourself. You know what you look like because of mirrors and photographs, but out there in the world, as you move among your fellow human beings, whether strangers or friends or the most intimate beloveds, your own face is invisible to you. You can see other parts of yourself, arms and legs, hands and feet, shoulders and torso, but only from the front, nothing of the back except the backs of your legs if you twist them into the right position, but not your face, never your face, and in the end - at least as far as others are concerned - your face is who you are, the essential fact of your identity. Passports do not contain pictures of hands and feet. Even you, who have lived inside your body for sixty-four years now, would probably be unable to recognize your foot in an isolated photograph of that foot, not to speak of your ear, or your elbow, or one of your eyes in close-up. All so familiar to you in the context of the whole, but utterly anonymous when taken piece by piece. We are all aliens to ourselves, and if we have any sense of who we are, it is only because we live inside the eyes of others." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Arthur Miller
item.description: "Just remember, kid, you can quicker get back a million dollars that was stole than a word that you gave away." -- Arthur Miller

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Stefan Zweig
item.description: "Time to leave now, get out of this room, go somewhere, anywhere; sharpen this feeling of happiness and freedom, stretch your limbs, fill your eyes, be awake, wider awake, vividly awake in every sense and every pore." -- Stefan Zweig

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Willa Cather
item.description: "The world is little, people are little, human life is little. There is only one big thing — desire." -- Willa Cather

item.title: Rooja add a quote by George Saunders
item.description: "Don't be afraid to be confused. Try to remain permanently confused. Anything is possible. Stay open, forever, so open it hurts, and then open up some more, until the day you die, world without end, amen." -- George Saunders

item.title: Rooja add a quote by John Greenleaf Whittier
item.description: "The windows of my soul I throw Wide open to the sun." -- John Greenleaf Whittier

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Jennifer Donnelly
item.description: "Together in our house, in the firelight, we are the world made small." -- Jennifer Donnelly

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Simone de Beauvoir
item.description: "She was ready to deny the existence of space and time rather than admit that love might not be eternal." -- Simone de Beauvoir

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Rooja add a quote by R.A. Salvatore
item.description: "It is better, I think, to grab at the stars than to sit flustered because you know you cannot reach them." -- R.A. Salvatore

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Judy Blume
item.description: "My only advice is to stay aware, listen carefully, and yell for help if you need it." -- Judy Blume

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "Books have a unique way of stopping time in a particular moment and saying: Let’s not forget this." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Love is so short, forgetting is so long." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "No medicine cures what happiness cannot." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Alice Hoffman
item.description: "Books may well be the only true magic." -- Alice Hoffman

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Honoré de Balzac
item.description: "All happiness depends on courage and work." -- Honoré de Balzac

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Marguerite Duras
item.description: "Our mothers always remain the strangest, craziest people we've ever met." -- Marguerite Duras

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Charles Darwin
item.description: "If I had my life to live over again, I would have made a rule to read some poetry and listen to some music at least once every week." -- Charles Darwin

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Mario Vargas Llosa
item.description: "Memory is a snare, pure and simple; it alters, it subtly rearranges the past to fit the present." -- Mario Vargas Llosa

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Mario Vargas Llosa
item.description: "One can't fight with oneself, for this battle has only one loser." -- Mario Vargas Llosa

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Carlos Fuentes
item.description: "You start by writing to live. You end by writing so as not to die." -- Carlos Fuentes

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Elaine May
item.description: "You know how sometimes you lie in bed at night and think, “What if the law of gravity just wears out and lets go and I drift into space?” Does that ever make you anxious?" -- Elaine May

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Daniel Defoe
item.description: "It is never too late to be wise." -- Daniel Defoe

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you obey all of the rules, you miss all of the fun." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Armistead Maupin
item.description: "Laugh all you want and cry all you want and whistle at pretty men in the street and to hell with anybody who thinks you're a damned fool!" -- Armistead Maupin

item.title: Rooja add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami

item.title: Rooja add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "Do your thing and don't care if they like it." -- Tina Fey
